programme.title: Knightriders
programme.desc: George Romero's unusual story of a modern-day Renaissance troupe whose participants follow a medieval code of honor.

programme.title: Dead Mary
programme.desc: A seemingly innocent rhyme resurrects a devious killer who terrorizes a group of high-school friends.

programme.title: Opera
programme.desc: A hooded figure forces a young diva (Cristina Marsillach) to watch as he murders performers in a production of Verdi's opera "Macbeth."

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A bartender sends his wife (Yvette Vickers) and her lover (Michael Emmet) into a swamp where large smart leeches lurk.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: After taking a job as a church organist, the sole survivor of a fatal car crash encounters phantoms that lure her to a deserted carnival outside of town.

programme.title: The Deep Ones
programme.desc: A couple that is recovering from a recent miscarriage encounters overly friendly locals and strange goings-on at a coastal getaway.

programme.title: Ringu
programme.desc: A TV reporter (Nanako Matsushima) investigates a myth that claims death will follow a strange, ordered sequence of events.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A bartender sends his wife (Yvette Vickers) and her lover (Michael Emmet) into a swamp where large smart leeches lurk.

programme.title: Ringu
programme.desc: A TV reporter (Nanako Matsushima) investigates a myth that claims death will follow a strange, ordered sequence of events.

programme.title: The Banshee Chapter
programme.desc: Anne investigates the links between her friend's disappearance, a secret government chemical and an odd radio broadcast with an unknown origin.

programme.title: The Taking of Deborah Logan
programme.desc: Mia records the daily lives of Deborah and her daughter Sarah as part of her thesis. As the days progress, strange things happen around Deborah, and it becomes apparent something has taken control of her.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: Bunks and the showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.
